fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 10Y
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR term = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[TERM_LABEL]
VAR valueBase = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD] + 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Fix Value T]
RETURN
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    term = "10 Yr" || term = "10 Yr Swap", valueBase,
    term = "9 Yr" || term = "9 Yr Swap", (4/5) * valueBase,
    term = "8 Yr" || term = "8 Yr Swap", (3/5) * valueBase,
    term = "7 Yr" || term = "7 Yr Swap", (2/5) * valueBase,
    term = "6 Yr" || term = "6 Yr Swap", (1/5) * valueBase,
    term = "12 Yr" || term = "12 Yr Swap", (9/10) * valueBase,
    term = "15 Yr" || term = "15 Yr Swap", (3/4) * valueBase,
    term = "20 Yr" || term = "20 Yr Swap", (1/2) * valueBase,
    term = "25 Yr" || term = "25 Yr Swap", (1/4) * valueBase,
    term = "11 Yr" || term = "11 Yr Swap", (19/20) * valueBase,
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level IF chains to a SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) structure. All column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[Column] format and the summed base value uses the existing calculated fields 'Delta Down T USD' and 'Fix Value T' from the same table.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation evaluates TERM_LABEL and combines row-level calculated fields without any aggregations or parameters, so it should be created as a calculated column (row-level/dimension).
